mapper.select:
SELECT p10_liqui_transfer_record.casee_number caseeNumber, p10_liqui_transfer_record.handover_time handoverTime, p10_liqui_transfer_record.STATUS, p10_liqui_transfer_record.casee_id, p10_liqui_transfer_record.create_time, p10_liqui_transfer_record.liqui_transfer_record_id liquiTransferRecordId, substring( JSON_EXTRACT( p10_task_node.form_data, "$.applicationSubmissionTime" ), 2, 10 ) AS applicationSubmissionTime, p10_institution.ins_name insName, p10_outles.outles_name outlesName, p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrust_ins_id, p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrust_outles_id, p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrusted_ins_id, p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrusted_outles_id, p10_liqui_transfer_record.project_id, p10_liqui_transfer_record.node_id, entrustedIns.ins_name entrustedInsName, entrustedOutles.outles_name entrustedOutlesName, p10_casee.executed_name as executorSubjectName, p10_casee.applicant_name as applicantSubjectName FROM `p10_liqui_transfer_record` LEFT JOIN p10_task_node ON p10_task_node.node_id = p10_liqui_transfer_record.node_id LEFT JOIN p10_institution ON p10_institution.ins_id = p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrust_ins_id LEFT JOIN p10_outles ON p10_outles.outles_id = p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrust_outles_id LEFT JOIN p10_institution AS entrustedIns ON entrustedIns.ins_id = p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrusted_ins_id LEFT JOIN p10_outles AS entrustedOutles ON entrustedOutles.outles_id = p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrusted_outles_id LEFT JOIN p10_casee ON p10_casee.casee_id = p10_liqui_transfer_record.casee_id WHERE p10_liqui_transfer_record.del_flag = 0
and (p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrusted_ins_id = #{login.insId} or p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrust_ins_id = #{login.insId})
and (p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrusted_outles_id = #{login.outlesId} or p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrust_outles_id = #{login.outlesId})
and p10_liqui_transfer_record.status = #{query.status}
and p10_casee.executed_name like concat('%', #{query.subjectName}, '%')
AND p10_liqui_transfer_record.handover_time BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{query.beginDate}, '%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') and DATE_FORMAT(#{query.endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')
GROUP BY p10_liqui_transfer_record.casee_id, p10_liqui_transfer_record.project_id, p10_liqui_transfer_record.node_id ORDER BY p10_liqui_transfer_record.create_time DESC

SELECT p10_liqui_transfer_record.casee_number, p10_liqui_transfer_record.handover_time, p10_liqui_transfer_record.casee_id, p10_liqui_transfer_record.liqui_transfer_record_id, p10_liqui_transfer_record.project_id, p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrusted_ins_id, p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrusted_outles_id, p10_liqui_transfer_record.status, substring( JSON_EXTRACT( p10_task_node.form_data, "$.applicationSubmissionTime" ), 2, 10 ) AS applicationSubmissionTime, JSON_EXTRACT( p10_task_node.form_data, "$.auctionApplicationFile" ) AS auctionApplicationFile, p10_institution.ins_name insName, p10_outles.outles_name outlesName FROM `p10_liqui_transfer_record` LEFT JOIN p10_task_node ON p10_task_node.node_id = p10_liqui_transfer_record.node_id LEFT JOIN p10_institution ON p10_institution.ins_id = p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrust_ins_id LEFT JOIN p10_outles ON p10_outles.outles_id = p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrust_outles_id WHERE p10_liqui_transfer_record.del_flag=0 AND p10_liqui_transfer_record.liqui_transfer_record_id=#{liquiTransferRecordId}

SELECT p10_liqui_transfer_record.casee_number caseeNumber, p10_liqui_transfer_record.*, p10_institution.ins_name insName, p10_outles.outles_name outlesName, entrustedIns.ins_name entrustedInsName, entrustedOutles.outles_name entrustedOutlesName FROM `p10_liqui_transfer_record` LEFT JOIN p10_institution ON p10_institution.ins_id = p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrust_ins_id LEFT JOIN p10_outles ON p10_outles.outles_id = p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrust_outles_id LEFT JOIN p10_institution AS entrustedIns ON entrustedIns.ins_id = p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrusted_ins_id LEFT JOIN p10_outles AS entrustedOutles ON entrustedOutles.outles_id = p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrusted_outles_id WHERE p10_liqui_transfer_record.del_flag = 0 AND p10_liqui_transfer_record.casee_id = #{caseeId}

SELECT p10_liqui_transfer_record.casee_number, p10_liqui_transfer_record.handover_time, p10_liqui_transfer_record.casee_id, p10_liqui_transfer_record.node_id, p10_liqui_transfer_record.liqui_transfer_record_id, p10_liqui_transfer_record.project_id, p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrust_ins_id, p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrust_outles_id, p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrusted_ins_id, p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrusted_outles_id, substring( JSON_EXTRACT( p10_task_node.form_data, "$.applicationSubmissionTime" ), 2, 10 ) AS applicationSubmissionTime, JSON_EXTRACT( p10_task_node.form_data, "$.auctionApplicationFile" ) AS auctionApplicationFile, p10_institution.ins_name insName, p10_outles.outles_name outlesName FROM `p10_liqui_transfer_record` LEFT JOIN p10_task_node ON p10_task_node.node_id = p10_liqui_transfer_record.node_id LEFT JOIN p10_institution ON p10_institution.ins_id = p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrust_ins_id LEFT JOIN p10_outles ON p10_outles.outles_id = p10_liqui_transfer_record.entrust_outles_id WHERE p10_liqui_transfer_record.del_flag=0 AND p10_liqui_transfer_record.liqui_transfer_record_id=#{liquiTransferRecordId}
